title: Christine McGuinness braves the cold weather in a vest top and checked mini skirt in Cheshire
text:
She never fails in the glamour stakes, always stepping out in a head turning ensemble.

And Christine McGuinness had all eyes on her once again as she stepped out in a skimpy ensemble following a visit to The Style Lounge in Cheshire on Thursday.

The Real Housewives Of Cheshire star, 31, donned a form-fitting cream vest top and a brown checked mini skirt, teaming the ensemble with cream knee-high knitted boots.

Dare to bare: Christine McGuinness had all eyes on her once again as she stepped out in a skimpy ensemble following a visit to The Style Lounge in Cheshire on Thursday

The mother-of-three appeared in high spirits as she flashed the flesh in her outfit, despite it being the middle of Autumn.

Christine accessorised her look with a large designer handbag and added a pair of over sized sunglasses.

The reality beauty styled her blonde locks into bouncy curls, while as accentuated her features with a delicate layer of make-up.

The wife of TV presenter Paddy McGuinness beamed to the camera as she made her way to the car.

Fashionista: The Real Housewives Of Cheshire star, 31, donned a form-fitting cream vest top and a brown checked mini skirt, teaming the ensemble with cream knee-high knitted boots

At one point she stopped to pull up her boots,further showcasing her slender pins as she did so.

It was a busy day for Christine as that day also saw her lark around at The Chistmas Wish Event at Parea in Cheshire.

Playing around with the toys and decorations at the bash, the model was in her element.

Christine looked phenomenal at the event as she slipped her hourglass curves into a fitted scarlet mini dress.

Braving the cold: The mother-of-three appeared in high spirits as she flashed the flesh in her outfit, despite it being the middle of Autumn

The eye-catching design featured an elaborate ruffled neckline which teased at her ample bust.

The mother-of-three completed the look with a pair of towering white stilettos whilst she injected some glitz with a diamond necklace and chandelier earrings.

The outing came after Christine spoke candidly about her struggles to conceive her first child after overcoming anorexia, during a candid interview on Giovanna Fletcher's Happy Mum Happy Baby.

The RHOC star - who shares Leo and Penelope, six, and three-year-old Felicity, with her husband Paddy, 46 - also admitted she feared miscarrying her twins when she was three months pregnant after experiencing heavy bleeding.

Candid: The outing came after Christine spoke candidly about her struggles to conceive her first child after overcoming anorexia

According to the NHS, anorexia nervosa is 'an eating disorder and serious mental health condition. People who have anorexia try to keep their weight as low as possible by not eating enough food or exercising too much, or both.'

Bravely sharing her past battle, the TV personality explained she was anorexic during her teenage years, which had a massive impact on her family planning journey.

The reality star detailed: 'I had anorexia for over 10 years as a child, all through my teenage years, [and was getting better] when I met my husband aged 19, 20. It was that strive and I just really wanted to be a mum that made me get over that.

'When I went to see a doctor the reason I wasn’t ovulating or having my periods was down to having an eating disorder. That made me get better but it took four years for everything to regulate.

'You’re tracking your chart and your temperature. My husband works away a lot so we had to make the most of our time together.'
description: The Real Housewives Of Cheshire star, 31, donned a form-fitting cream vest top and a brown checked mini skirt paired with knee-high boots following a visit to The Style Lounge in Cheshire on Thursday.
